message:
I'm thinking of using my blog for all my posts online (like a tumblr). I'm searching for a theme with these features

1. Clean UI
2. Good support for Arabic (or easy to do myself)
3. Beautiful !!!
4. As tumblr, some posts will have no title, just a post date & some text

Any suggestions?

data.message: I feel in love with svbtle the first time I saw its writing interface.

1. My goal: Something like tumblr: good for small posts as well as long-form writing. I want to host it myself because I had an old blog hosted on SpellCoder which doesn't exist anymore!

2. Currently I'm using Pelican for my blog. Pelican is a static site builder, like Jekyll.

3. I'm searching for a good theme which fits my above requirements, but I can look into another platforms if it fits me better.

4. Medium allows Arabic, but the layout is always LTR. 

5. Svbtle is invitation-only & I can't host it

There is a very early open source project called Manshar basically it is medium for arabic content, may be you can help them :)
http://www.manshar.com/
https://github.com/manshar
Svbtle stopped being invitation only a few month ago but yes, I agree not being able to host it is a bummer.
we used in in Egyptian geeks (http://egyptiangeeks.com/) blog a theme inspired by Svbtle: https://github.com/themeskult/wp-svbtle
